author: Lal RIMAWIA
text: I am one of the First elected Councillor of Aizawl Municipal council,which is the first ever Municipal council in the state of Mizoram,India. The first election was held in 2010 October. So being a first memeber of Aizawl Municipal council, what step would be taken to make the council accountable. What is the status of Councillor in different country?
title: Local Government
